content: *this beautiful shawl is also popular for use as a prayer shawl lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60403 skill level beginner chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 500 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers gauge 5 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet + 9 row = 9 in \ 23 cm shawl is worked in two halves the second half starts from the beginning chain center this construction allows both ends of the shawl to reflect the same shape
